title: Apps using Summoners Rift
body:
So I was going through my facebook feed just before, and I noticed that one of the ads had a picture that is 100% Summoners Rift on it...
The game is called Haunted Empire-Three Kingdoms, I dunno if anyone really cares but I figured doing something like that might be a little bit illegal.

replies.body: Lots of facebook apps/games use recognised brands to get people interested in most cases being illegal, one such game being "Pokémon". Not even the game's real name and has nothing to do with Pokémon, just uses the name and pictures. It's just so trivial to these large companies that they can't be bothered doing anything about it.
Yeah no this happens all the time, not much is done about them cause they are hardly worth riot's time.
